org.foxlabs.validation.converter

Class TimeZoneConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.foxlabs.validation.AbstractValidation<V>
      • org.foxlabs.validation.converter.AbstractConverter<TimeZone>
        • org.foxlabs.validation.converter.TimeZoneConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter<TimeZone>, Validation<TimeZone>

    public final class TimeZoneConverter
extends AbstractConverter<TimeZone>
    This class provides Converter implementation for the java.util.TimeZone type.
    Author:
    Fox Mulder

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public Class<TimeZone> getType()
        Returns java.util.TimeZone type.
        Returns:
        java.util.TimeZone type.

      • doDecode

        protected <T> TimeZone doDecode(String value,
                                ValidationContext<T> context)
        Converts string representation of time zone into java.util.TimeZone object. The value specified should be either a time zone ID, an abbreviation or a GMT string or an offset in hours.

        This method doesn't parse localized string representations of time zone.

        Overrides:
        doDecode in class AbstractConverter<TimeZone>
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of validated entity.
        Parameters:
        value - String representation of time zone.
        context - Validation context.
        Returns:
        Decoded java.util.TimeZone object.
        Throws:
        MalformedValueException - if the specified string could not be parsed as time zone.

      • doEncode

        protected <T> String doEncode(TimeZone value,
                              ValidationContext<T> context)
        Converts java.util.TimeZone object into string representation.
        Overrides:
        doEncode in class AbstractConverter<TimeZone>
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of validated entity.
        Parameters:
        value - java.util.TimeZone object to be encoded.
        context - Validation context.
        Returns:
        String representation of time zone.

      • toGMTString

        public static String toGMTString(int offset)
        Returns GMT string of the format GMT+HH:MM for the specified time zone raw offset.
        Parameters:
        offset - Time zone raw offset.
        Returns:
        GMT string for the specified time zone raw offset.

      • parseTimeZone

        public static TimeZone parseTimeZone(String value)
        Returns time zone for the specified ID. The ID specified should be either a time zone ID, an abbreviation, a GMT string or an offset in hours.
        Parameters:
        value - Time zone ID.
        Returns:
        Time zone for the specified ID or null if ID is not valid time zone ID.

      • getID

        public static String getID(TimeZone value)
        Returns ID for the specified time zone. The returned string will be either a time zone ID or GMT string.
        Parameters:
        value - Time zone which ID to be returned.
        Returns:
        ID for the specified time zone.

      • getDisplayName

        public static String getDisplayName(TimeZone value,
                                    Locale locale)
        Returns localized name for the specified time zone. The returned string will be in the format (GMT+HH:MM) TIME-ZONE-NAME for the specified locale.
        Parameters:
        value - Time zone which name to be returned.
        locale - Desired locale.
        Returns:
        Localized name for the specified time zone.
